# rotationMode

**Instance Property**

Determines whether objects animating along the path rotate to match the path tangent.

## Declaration

```swift
var rotationMode: CAAnimationRotationMode? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values for this property are described in [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/rotation-mode-values]. The default value of this property is `nil`, which indicates that objects should not rotate to follow the path.

The effect of setting this property to a non-`nil` value when no path object is supplied is undefined.

## Related Documentation

- **path**: The path for a point-based property to follow.
